findings.title: Recommendation : use page navigation to avoid unexpected exceeding of Gas
findings.description: The user should have the ability to separate his action in several transactions if needed to avoid unexpected exceeding of Gas.

findings.title: 1. Floating pragma
findings.description: The contracts use floating pragma ^0.8.10 and ^0.8.6.

findings.title: Local variable shadowing
findings.description: Local variable shadowing may lead to unexpected code behavior in future development.

findings.title: Boolean equality
findings.description: Boolean constants can be used directly and do not need to be compared to true or false.

findings.title: Unused event
findings.description: The TokenDestinationAllowed event was declared but never used.

findings.title: Possible corruption of logic if MIN_PERIOD is changed
findings.description: The constant MIN_PERIOD is linked to the amount of vesting periods and changing it may corrupt the logic of the functions.

findings.title: Possible gas exceeding
findings.description: The contract can exceed the gas limit in long cycles or by returning a big array.

findings.title: Vesting Revocation Vulnerability
findings.description: The owner can revoke a vesting and take back unvested money, but rewards earned up to that moment would still be available.

findings.title: The owner can change the master version of the vesting contract
findings.description: The owner has the capability to modify the master version of the vesting contract.
